item.title: getting into cycling
item.description: If you're like me, you probably had your on-and-off bouts using a bicycle. Perhaps you even thought it's not meant for you. However, life changes, Manila traffic got worst, and I wanted to break away from being sedentary. So here I am with a renewed interest in using a bicycle â€¦
item.dc:creator: Matt Lebrun
